Plot: Kevin Carson is a young man living in the projects who has to survive a three-day weekend after his opportunistic neighbors find out he's holding a winning lottery ticket worth $370 million.
Title: Lottery Ticket
Writer: Abdul Williams (screenplay), Erik White (story), Abdul Williams (story)
Actors: Shad Moss, Brandon T. Jackson, Naturi Naughton, Loretta Devine
tomatoConsensus: There's a worthwhile message at the heart of Lottery Ticket, but it's buried under stale humor, tired stereotypes, and obvious clichés.
